name: Smoking Status
description: This value set indicates the current smoking status of a patient. The vocabulary selected for this value set is the best approximation of the statuses in Meaningful Use (MU) Stage 2. The smoking status value set includes a special code to communicate if the smoking status is unknown

fhir_comments:
Value Set: Smoking Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.38 STATIC 2012-07-01
Code System(s)  SNOMED CT 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96  Note the base resource does not allow for display terms -Gforge ticket Item and expansion doesn;t allow for time less than a seconde for instantiation so assume is to be machine generated.
